item.title: Deciding to Stop
item.description: I’m a slow reader with a short attention span, but I’d like to read a lot more books than I currently manage. So I’m like the armchair analyst who dreams of changing the world – tons of ambition, but lack of skills (and possibly desire?). A recurrent problem for me has been that I start some books, partly or nearly finish them, have no interest in continuing, but can’t start other books until I finish the earlier ones.
